desmoj.core.dist

Class BoolDistConstant

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.core.simulator.NamedObject
      • desmoj.core.simulator.ModelComponent
        • desmoj.core.simulator.Reportable
          • desmoj.core.dist.Distribution
            • desmoj.core.dist.BoolDist
              • desmoj.core.dist.BoolDistConstant

  • public class BoolDistConstant
extends BoolDist
    Boolean constant "pseudo"-distribution returns a single constant predefined boolean value. This "distribution" is most useful for testing purposes. The value to be returned can be specified at construction time.
    See Also:
    Distribution

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean constValue
      Stores the status for the constant value to be returnde from this "pseudo"-distribution

      • BoolDistConstant

        public BoolDistConstant(Model owner,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        boolean constantValue,
                        boolean showInReport,
                        boolean showInTrace)
        Creates a constant boolean "pseudo" distribution with the constant value given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        owner - Model : The distribution's owner
        name - java.lang.String : The distribution's name
        constantValue - long : The constant boolean value produced by this distribution
        showInReport - boolean : Flag for producing reports
        showInTrace - boolean : Flag for producing trace output

      • sample

        public boolean sample()
        Returns the next constant boolean sample of this distribution. For this "pseudo"-distribution it is always is the default value specified through the constructor or via the setConstant method.
        Specified by:
        sample in class BoolDist
        Returns:
        boolean : The constant sample

        Changes the constant value to the new one specified.
        Parameters:
        newValue - boolean : the new constant value to be returned by this pseudo distribution
